content: {"name": "The Investors Academy Inc", "alternate_name": "", "description": "This resource accepts clothing and shoe donations", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "122 Howell Drive Southwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Adamsville", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30331", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.7548462, "longitude": -84.5031898}, "phones": [{"number": "(470) 599-7956", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
